about_the_game:
Do you want every Golden Plunger unlocked??
This is your chance!!
ATTACK OF THE EVIL POOP Game Guide will give you very important hints to master your bathroom skills!
Sitting at the toilet will never be the same!


INSTALLATION PATH
After downloading it, go to:
Library -> ATTACK OF THE EVIL POOP -> Mouse secondary button, "Properties" -> Browse Local Files...
And voila!
